title: Club is warned releasing player to foreign league that requires status check
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is releasing a player
AND the release to foreign league field is set to yes
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Submit or Approve

title: User is alerted if player is on option when submitting a release
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is releasing a player
AND that player is optioned
custom_expected: THEN show warning (BOC can ignore and continue)
